customInstructions.description: Add specific guidance for the AI
customInstructions.placeholder: e.g., 'Use formal language for German translations' or 'Keep translations concise for mobile UI'
customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions

context.description: Customize what context AI uses for smarter translations

glossary.description: Use your project glossary for consistent terminology
glossary.label: Glossary Terms

context.saveNote: Changes apply to all future AI translations
context.title: Context Configuration

tm.description: Reference similar translations from your TM
tm.label: Translation Memory

pageDescription: Configure AI providers for context-aware translation suggestions

anthropic.description: Claude 4.5 models for nuanced, context-aware translations

apiKeyHint.anthropic: Get your API key from console.anthropic.com
apiKeyHint.googleAI: Get your API key from aistudio.google.com
apiKeyHint.mistral: Get your API key from console.mistral.ai
apiKeyHint.openai: Get your API key from platform.openai.com

form.enableProviderDescription: Allow this provider for AI translations
form.modelDescription: Choose the model to use for AI translations

googleAI.description: Gemini 3 models for fast, cost-effective translations

mistral.description: Mistral models for efficient European language support

openai.description: GPT-5 and GPT-4.1 models for high-quality translations

removeDialog.description: This will remove the API key and disable AI translations using {provider}. You can add it back later.
removeDialog.title: Remove {provider}?

quality.enableDescription: Use AI to analyze translation accuracy and style
quality.modelDescription: Choose the model for quality analysis
quality.noProvidersWarning: No AI providers configured. Enable at least one provider above to use AI quality evaluation.
quality.providerDescription: Choose which enabled AI provider to use for quality evaluation
quality.title: Quality Evaluation
